text: The Flame nebula, also known as NGC 2024, is a nebula in the constellation Orion. It has no well defined edge. It is about 900 to 1,500 light-years away.Astronomy Picture of the Day July 13, 1999 The nebula is part of the Orion complex. This is a star-making area that also has the famous Horsehead nebula in it.
